alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 18 at 8:12PM AKDT until October 19 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph shifting to the southwest with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The first frontal band is bringing in strong winds this evening. A second band late tonight into Wednesday will produce highest gusts with a wind shift to the SW Wednesday afternoon resulting in another period of high winds.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
